scripts.articleSite:QArun: npm run prereport && npx cypress run --headless --record --key 21a92336-6e6a-416a-847f-4a752742f7ce --parallel
scripts.mochawesome-merger: npx mochawesome-merge "cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json" > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.browser-config: npm run articleSite:QArun -- --browser chrome --group Chrome --ci-build-id 2 & npm run articleSite:QArun -- --browser firefox --group Firefox --ci-build-id 2 && npm run junit-merger && npm run mochawesome-merger
